summary: An Air Paris jet is missing at the bottom of the Atlantic. When Investigative reporter Nicola Wilson's newspaper editors refuse to assign her the story, she quits to find out what caused the accident that took the lives of 212 passengers.
cast: Kate Thomsen|Robert Cicchini|Larry Herron|Jennifer Jelsema|Richard Riehle|Deborah Staples|Michael Brian Ogden|Craig Powers|Susan Ericksen|Julia Glander|Alex Leydenfrost|Jacqui Bernhardt|Amy McFadden|Kimberly Harsch|Diana VanWesep|Kurt Schroeder|Dominique Predali|Shelley Irwin|Rick Lockridge|Florencia Gimena Prada|Judy VanKuiken|Cynthia Bates Twining|Troy Thrash|Maria Taylor|Chase Yi|Robyn Hairston|David Gries|Claude Faro|Anna Alpert|Robert Chessman|Chip Duford|Danielle Cohn|Judy Johnson|Joe Carmolli|Rebecca McCroskey|Jean-Yves Munch|Gerald Nehra|Marcia Garrigan|William Rhodes|Robyn Hairston
keywords: jet|aviation|video blog|newspaper reporter|person thought dead is alive
title: Pilot Error
